TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit LazyInitializer extends System.Object
public ref class LazyInitializer abstract sealed

span.span: Provides lazy initialization routines.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这些例程可避免无需分配的专用迟缓初始化实例，而使用引用以确保目标已初始化为这些表进行访问。These routines avoid needing to allocate a dedicated, lazy-initialization instance, instead using references to ensure targets have been initialized as they are accessed. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 EnsureInitialized 为延迟初始化使用一个布尔值以跟踪是否已发生初始化的值和要用作相互排斥锁的对象。The following example demonstrates how to use EnsureInitialized to lazily initialize a value using a Boolean value to track whether initialization has already happened and an object to use as the mutual exclusion lock. ```vb Dim _data As ExpensiveData = Nothing Dim _dataInitialized As Boolean = False Dim _dataLock As Object = Nothing ' ... Dim name = LazyInitializer.EnsureInitialized(_data, _dataInitialized, _dataLock) ``` ```csharp ExpensiveData _data = null; bool _dataInitialized = false; object _dataLock = new object(); // ... ExpensiveData dataToUse = LazyInitializer.EnsureInitialized(ref _data, ref _dataInitialized, ref _dataLock); ```

threadsafe.span: 方法是线程安全的可能从多个线程同时调用。

span.span: The methods of are thread-safe and may be called from multiple threads concurrently.
Lazy Initialization

summary.span: 在服务尚未初始化的情况下，初始化目标类型。

span.span: Initializes a target type if it hasn't already been initialized.

MemberSignature.Value: public static T EnsureInitialized<T> (ref T target) where T : class;
.method public static hidebysig !!T EnsureInitialized<class T>(!!T& target) cil managed
Public Shared Function EnsureInitialized(Of T As Class) (ByRef target As T) As T
static member EnsureInitialized : -> 'T (requires 'T : null)

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 要初始化的引用的类型。

span.span: The type of the reference to be initialized.

param.name: target
param.span: 在尚未初始化的情况下，要初始化的类型 T 的引用。

span.span: A reference of type T to initialize if it has not already been initialized.

summary.span: 在目标引用或值类型尚未初始化的情况下，使用其默认构造函数初始化目标引用或值类型。

span.span: Initializes a target reference type with the type's default constructor if it hasn't already been initialized.

returns.span: 类型 的初始化引用。

span.span: The initialized reference of type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅在引用类型中使用此方法。This method may only be used on reference types. 若要确保初始化值类型，请参阅 EnsureInitialized 其他重载。To ensure initialization of value types, see other overloads of EnsureInitialized. 此方法可同时由多个线程来初始化`target`。This method may be used concurrently by multiple threads to initialize `target`. 在的多个线程同时访问此方法，多个实例`T`可能创建，但只有一个存储到`target`。In the event that multiple threads access this method concurrently, multiple instances of `T` may be created, but only one will be stored into `target`. 在这种情况下，此方法将不处理不存储的对象。In such an occurrence, this method will not dispose of the objects that were not stored. 如果必须释放此类对象，则由调用方确定一个对象已不使用，然后相应地释放对象。If such objects must be disposed, it is up to the caller to determine if an object was not used and to then dispose of the object appropriately.

exception.span: 缺少访问类型 的构造函数的权限。

span.span: Permissions to access the constructor of type were missing.

exception.span: 类型 没有默认的构造函数。

span.span: Type does not have a default constructor.
Lazy Initialization

static member EnsureInitialized : * Func<'T (requires 'T : null)> -> 'T (requires 'T : null)

typeparam.span: 要初始化的引用的引用类型。

span.span: The reference type of the reference to be initialized.

param.name: target
param.span: 在尚未初始化的情况下，要初始化的类型 T 的引用。

span.span: The reference of type T to initialize if it hasn't already been initialized.

param.name: valueFactory
param.span: 调用函数以初始化该引用。

span.span: The function that is called to initialize the reference.

summary.span: 在目标引用类型尚未初始化的情况下，使用指定函数初始化目标引用类型。

span.span: Initializes a target reference type by using a specified function if it hasn't already been initialized.
The initialized value of type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只能在引用类型上使用此方法和`valueFactory`可能不会返回空引用 (在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing)。This method may only be used on reference types, and `valueFactory` may not return a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic). 若要确保初始化值类型或允许空引用类型，请参阅 EnsureInitialized 其他重载。To ensure initialization of value types or to allow null reference types, see other overloads of EnsureInitialized. 此方法可同时由多个线程来初始化`target`。This method may be used concurrently by multiple threads to initialize `target`. 在的多个线程同时访问此方法，多个实例`T`可能创建，但只有一个存储到`target`。In the event that multiple threads access this method concurrently, multiple instances of `T` may be created, but only one will be stored into `target`. 在这种情况下，此方法将不处理不存储的对象。In such an occurrence, this method will not dispose of the objects that were not stored. 如果必须释放此类对象，则由调用方确定一个对象已不使用，然后相应地释放对象。If such objects must be disposed, it is up to the caller to determine if an object was not used and to then dispose of the object appropriately.

exception.span: 类型 没有默认的构造函数。

span.span: Type does not have a default constructor.

exception.span: 返回 null（在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing）。

span.span: returned null (Nothing in Visual Basic).
Lazy Initialization

summary.span: 在目标引用或值类型尚未初始化的情况下，使用其默认构造函数初始化目标引用或值类型。

span.span: Initializes a target reference or value type with its default constructor if it hasn't already been initialized.
The initialized value of type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`intialized`指定为 true，则会不发生任何进一步的初始化。If `intialized` is specified as true, then no further initialization occurs.
